title: CITR Presents: Yoghurt Warrior Summer Look Book

We’ve been covering the street wear brand **Yoghurt Warrior** for a little while now.

What’s impressed us from the very moment we became aware of the brand was his their willingness to indulge in gruesome and surrealist imagery, remember Winnie Wee Pants (A grotesque dribbling teddy bear)? Well that’s just one of the reasons we love this designer. For their latest range ‘_Jumanji_‘, the images are more subdued, but exciting none the less. As always we highly recommended treating yourself. Check out the Look Book above and click bellow to buy a piece.

[Check out **Yoghurt Warrior’s** Online Store!](http://www.yoghurtwarriorclothing.com/)
